text: Xinfeng tian jing de ren dangzhong, you xuduo renwei yuan shi nimen zai ji xindao zhihou bian cheng bu xindao zhe, zhe shi yinwei tamen zai zhenli ji ming zhihou ji shi nimen de yuangu. Dan nimen yingdang shu rao tamen, yuanliang tamen, zhidao zhenzhu fabu mingling. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de
